text.jpText:
『JBCクラシック』当日。
“全部で1着”宣言、折り返しの3戦目だ。
text.enText:
It is the day of the JBC Classic. It was the 
third race of the season, and the third round 
of the "All in one race" campaign.

text.jpText:
宣言以来、常に冷静に勝利を目指してきた
スマートファルコン。だが今日はぼんやりと
集中を欠いている様子だ。
text.enText:
Since its declaration, Smart Falcon has 
always been calmly striving for victory. But 
today, she seems to be in a daze. She seems 
to be lacking in concentration.

text.jpText:
トレーナーはレース後の話し合いを求めるが、
彼女は笑顔で話を遮り――
そのままレースに向かうのだった。
text.enText:
The trainer asked for a post-race discussion, 
but she interrupted her with a smile. 
She smiled and interrupted her, and 
went on to the race.
